com.lhings.java

Class LhingsDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lhings.java.LhingsDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class LhingsDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This abstract class is the base class for all the Java devices. Any device implemented with this library must extend LhingsDevice. Developers must override the method setup(), called once by the library to perform all initialization tasks required by the implementation, and the method loop(), called repeatedly by the library to execute the logic of the device. Also, methods annotated with Action, Event and StatusComponent must be implemented to define the actions, events and status components of the device. The frequency at which the loop() method is executed can be set using the method setLoopFrequency(float frequency). This class also provides convenience methods to interact with and obtain information about other devices that belong to the same Lhings account as this one. See methods getDevices(), requestAction() , storeStatus(), getStatus(), and statusRetrieve().

    • Constructor Detail

      • LhingsDevice

        public LhingsDevice(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String deviceName)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    LhingsException
        Creates a new device in Lhings associated to the account with the given username and password. Username and password will not be stored in any way, they will be used only at runtime. If the device is created for the first time, it will be registered in Lhings and its UUID will be stored for the next time it is launched.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the Lhings account.
        password - Password of the account.
        deviceName - The name of the device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a network or connectivity error occurs.
        LhingsException

      • LhingsDevice

        public LhingsDevice(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password,
            int port,
            java.lang.String deviceName)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    LhingsException
        Creates a new device in Lhings associated to the account with the given username and password. Username and password will not be stored in any way, they will be used only at runtime. If the device is created for the first time, it will be registered in Lhings and its UUID will be stored for the next time it is launched.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the Lhings account.
        password - Password of the account.
        port - The port the device will use to connect to the Internet for non-http communications.
        deviceName - The name of the device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a network or connectivity error occurs.
        LhingsException

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the device. The device starts session in Lhings and executes the loop() method periodically.

        public void stop()
        Stops the device

      • sendEvent

        protected void sendEvent(java.lang.String name)
        Sends an event without payload to Lhings.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event. If no such event is defined for this device no event is sent but a warning is shown in the log of the application.

      • sendEvent

        protected void sendEvent(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String payload)
        Sends an event with payload to Lhings.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event. If no such event is defined for this device no event is sent but a warning is shown in the log of the application.
        payload - The payload of the event.

      • setup

        public abstract void setup()
        Implementation must override this method and put in it all the initialization code required by device.

      • loop

        public abstract void loop()
        Implementations must override this method and put in it the device logic. This method will be called periodically by the SDK. The frequency at which it is called is set by the method setLoopFrequency().

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Used to retrieve the port used by this device to communicate with Lhings.
        Returns:
        The port number.

      • getLoopFrequency

        public float getLoopFrequency()
        Returns the number of times per second the method loop() is executed by the SDK.
        Returns:

      • setLoopFrequency

        public void setLoopFrequency(float loopFrequency)
        Sets the number of times per second the method loop() is executed by the SDK. The SDK will do its best to execute the loop() at the frequency requested, but it does not guarantee neither precision nor constant frequency.

      • getDevices

        public java.util.List<com.lhings.java.model.Device> getDevices()
                                                        throws LhingsException,
                                                               java.io.IOException
        This method returns a list of all the other devices that belong to the same account as the calling device. Since this method communicates with Lhings over the Internet, the call is blocking. If this is an issue consider executing this call in another thread.
        Returns:
        A list of Device instances, with the following information: name, uuid and type of the device, and online status.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        LhingsException

      • getStatus

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getStatus(java.lang.String uuid)
                                                           throws DeviceDoesNotExistException,
                                                                  DeviceUnreachableException,
                                                                  UnauthorizedException,
                                                                  LhingsException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the status of the given device.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the device whose status is to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A map whose keys are the names of the status components of the device, and whose values are the values of those status components. If the given uuid is the same as that of the calling device, null is returned. If the device whose status is requested is offline, only one the online status component is returned.
        Throws:
        DeviceDoesNotExistException - If no device exists with that uuid.
        DeviceUnreachableException - If the device could not be contacted over the internet.
        UnauthorizedException - If the device exists but the calling device is not authorized to access its status.
        LhingsException
        java.io.IOException

      • storeStatus

        public void storeStatus()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        LhingsException
        Stores the value of all the status components of this device in Lhings.
        Throws:
        LhingsException
        java.io.IOException

      • requestAction

        public java.lang.String requestAction(java.lang.String uuid,
                             java.lang.String actionName,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> arguments)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      LhingsException
        Request another device to perform one of its actions.Both the action name and argument names must have been declared by the other device in its descriptor file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid of the device that will perform the action.
        actionName - The name of the action to be performed.
        arguments - A Map with the name of the arguments of the action as keys and the values of those arguments as values.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        LhingsException
